abstract: Blockbuster, the movie rental chain, named a former chief executive of 7-Eleven to succeed its chief executive, John F. Antioco, who is resigning.
snippet: Blockbuster, the movie rental chain, named a former chief executive of 7-Eleven to succeed its chief executive, John F. Antioco, who is resigning.
lead_paragraph: Blockbuster, the movie rental chain, named a former chief executive of 7-Eleven to succeed its chief executive, John F. Antioco, who is resigning after a dispute over his pay.

headline.main: Former Chief Executive of 7-Eleven Chosen to Lead Blockbuster
headline.print_headline: Former Chief Executive of 7-Eleven Chosen to Lead Blockbuster
